Package org.dellroad.dataskin.ops

Interface StaticOperation<C,R>

Type Parameters:
C - configuration type for this operation
R - result type for this operation
All Superinterfaces:
Operation<C,R>
All Known Subinterfaces:
StaticAction<C,R>, StaticQuery<C,R>
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractStaticAction, AbstractStaticQuery
public interface StaticOperation<C,R> extends Operation<C,R>
An operation that is configured outside of the context of any particular target instance.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface org.dellroad.dataskin.ops.Operation

    Operation.Handle<C,R>, Operation.Progress

  • Method Details

    • perform

      R perform(C config, Consumer<? super Operation.Progress> progressUpdater) throws InterruptedException
      Execute this operation.

      The operation executes synchronously in the current thread. Progress updates may delivered to progressUpdater to update the progrss of the operation; these callbacks may occur in the current thread or in another thread.

      An in-progress operation may be cancelled by interrupting the current thread; if so, an InterruptedException is thrown.

      Parameters:
      config - the configuration for the operation
      progressUpdater - where progress reports should be sent
      Returns:
      operation result
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if config is invalid
      IllegalArgumentException - if progressUpdater is null
      InterruptedException
      See Also:
      • Operation.getHandle()

    • getHandle

      default Operation.Handle<C,R> getHandle(Object target)
      Description copied from interface: Operation
      Get a handle for executing this operation on the specified instance (if any).

      For an InstanceOperation, the target must be non-null, and the returned Operation.Handle will be bound to it.

      For a StaticOperation, the target must be null.

      Specified by:
      getHandle in interface Operation<C,R>
      Parameters:
      target - target object, or null if this is a StaticOperation
      Returns:
      handle for executing this operation on target

    • newConfig

      default C newConfig()
      Create a new configuration object for this operation.

      The implementation in StaticOperation attempts to instantiate an instance of the configuration type using a default constructor.

      Returns:
      new configuration object, never null unless the configuration type is Void
